Package info

Package info is implementation of Java class Info of Java the object info, which is passed into the StringTemplate V4 template engine as attribute 'info'.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileExt
    The Java class File already brings some valuable information about the name of a file and parts of it, which is accessible from a StringTemplate V4 template - but in this derived class it is even extended.
    Info
    The data structure providing general purpose information to the template expansion process.
    SimpleLogger
    Simple substitute for the log4j logger.

Package info Description

Package info is implementation of Java class Info of Java the object info, which is passed into the StringTemplate V4 template engine as attribute 'info'. Knowing the details of this class is essential for writing StringTemplate V4 templates: The public fields and public get methods of the class described here are accessible from within the template and provide some relevant information and useful services.
